document.topic_text: Wanted <> Dear friend need new server on ssd disks for fast speed,price 200 $ in year , who can, plz help PAYPAL bchkin@bk.ru Treat – Coup De Grace (2010) Apr 25, 2016 Hard Rock Melodic Rock | AOR Long-awaited 2010 release from one of the most legendary bands of the Scandinavian Melodic Rock scene. With such records as Organized Crime; Scratch and Bite and the self titled release in 1992 which to date is the last studio release from the band. Drummer Jamie Borger went on to play with Talisman and main songwriter and guitarist Anders Wickstrom went on to become a world renowned songwriter for Gotthard, Agnes and N*Sync amongst others. The band reunited in 2006 releasing a ‘best of’ with two new songs and played on several festivals all over Europe. 01 – Prelude Coup De Grace 02 – The War Is Over 03 – All In

Drummer Jamie Borger went on to play with Talisman and main songwriter and guitarist Anders Wickstrom went on to become a world renowned songwriter for Gotthard, Agnes and N*Sync amongst others.
